GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Document Editor, VOIP Support, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync), Excel, Word, Power Point, OneNote, Adobe Reader, PDF, Outlook, Office 365
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Speed Dialing, Loudspeaker, Call Divert

Multimedia.Music Player: Yes, Supports AMR, AAC, WMA, M4A, ASF, MP3
Multimedia.Sound Enhancement: Integrated Hands-free Speakers, Multi-microphone Uplink Noise Cancellation, Audio Streaming, Album Graphics Display in Music Player, Dolby Digital Plus Surround Sound, Cloud Music Offline Playback, Cloud Music Playback, Graphical Equalizer, Podcasts
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports 3GP, AVI, WMV, M4V, MP4, MOV, 3G2, Full HD

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (A2DP 1.2, GATT, OPP 1.1, HFP 1.6, PBAP 1.1, AVRCP 1.4)
Internet & Connectivity.Navigation Technology: A-GPS, A-GLONASS, BeiDou, Sensor Enhanced Positioning, with HERE Maps, HERE Transit, HERE Drive+

Display.Other Display Features: Sunlight Readability Enhancements, Super-sensitive Touch, Sculpted Glass, Refresh Rate 60 Hz, ClearBlack Display Technology, Brightness Control, Wide Viewing Angle, Corning Gorilla Glass 3, High Brightness Mode, Lumia Color Profile

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories
